data.title: HOT 100 Live Unsigned Artists & Bands
data.meta_description: Yes, it’s back once again! data.meta_site_name: Music Connection Magazine - Informing Music People Since 1977 - Music Information - Music Education - Music Industry News
data.text:
Yes, it’s back once again! After skipping last year due to the pandemic, Music Connection’s annual list of unsigned live performers has returned, placing the spotlight on individuals and bands who delivered unique excitement, expert musicianship and intriguing songcraft to stages all over the U.S. during the past year. In addition to MC staffers and freelance writers, the contributors to this list include producers, club bookers, music attorneys, managers, agents and other industry professionals. Currently, MC has reviewers in Los Angeles, New York, Detroit and Nashville. Livestreams have also become part of our offerings. So, to be considered for an aways-free live review, go to musicconnection.com/reviews/get-reviewed.
